enum:FORMATTER_REPOSITORY: defined by end device type repository
enum:RIGHT_APPLICATION_LINK: link as Application to a Network Server for traffic exchange, i.e. read uplink and write downlink
enum:RIGHT_APPLICATION_SETTINGS_API_KEYS: view and edit application API keys
enum:RIGHT_APPLICATION_SETTINGS_PACKAGES: view and edit application packages and associations
enum:RIGHT_GATEWAY_LINK: link as Gateway to a Gateway Server for traffic exchange, i.e. write uplink and read downlink
enum:RIGHT_GATEWAY_READ_SECRETS: retrieve secrets associated with a gateway
enum:RIGHT_GATEWAY_SETTINGS_API_KEYS: view and edit gateway API keys
enum:RIGHT_ORGANIZATION_ADD_AS_COLLABORA: add the organization as a collaborator on an existing entity
enum:RIGHT_ORGANIZATION_APPLICATIONS_CRE: create an application under the organization
enum:RIGHT_ORGANIZATION_APPLICATIONS_LIS: list the applications the organization is a collaborator of
enum:RIGHT_ORGANIZATION_CLIENTS_CREATE: create an OAuth client under the organization
enum:RIGHT_ORGANIZATION_CLIENTS_LIST: list the OAuth clients the organization is a collaborator of
enum:RIGHT_ORGANIZATION_GATEWAYS_CREATE: create a gateway under the organization
enum:RIGHT_ORGANIZATION_GATEWAYS_LIST: list the gateways the organization is a collaborator of
enum:RIGHT_ORGANIZATION_SETTINGS_API_KEY: view and edit organization API keys
enum:RIGHT_USER_APPLICATIONS_CREATE: create an application under the user account
enum:RIGHT_USER_APPLICATIONS_LIST: list applications the user is a collaborator of
enum:RIGHT_USER_AUTHORIZED_CLIENTS: view and edit authorized OAuth clients of the user
enum:RIGHT_USER_CLIENTS_CREATE: create an OAuth client under the user account
enum:RIGHT_USER_CLIENTS_LIST: list OAuth clients the user is a collaborator of
enum:RIGHT_USER_GATEWAYS_CREATE: create a gateway under the user account
enum:RIGHT_USER_GATEWAYS_LIST: list gateways the user is a collaborator of
enum:RIGHT_USER_ORGANIZATIONS_CREATE: create an organization under the user account
enum:RIGHT_USER_ORGANIZATIONS_LIST: list organizations the user is a member of
enum:RIGHT_USER_SETTINGS_API_KEYS: view and edit user API keys
enum:SOURCE_COMBINED_GEOLOCATION: estimated by a combination of geolocation sources
enum:SOURCE_REGISTRY: set in and updated from a registry
